title: Summer is here for over 500 National Lottery funded projects
text: National Lottery Funding will support a number of fun-filled community projects in England this summer. 508 projects will share in over £19 million to bring local people together throughout the summer holidays and beyond.

title: £1 million Scottish Land Fund boost for local communities
text: Seven local communities in different parts of Scotland will soon be reaping the rewards of community ownership, thanks to a Scottish Land Fund investment of over £1 million announced today.

title: Scottish Land Fund to help community buy historic Bannockburn House
text: An historic 17th-century mansion where Bonnie Prince Charlie famously resided for part of the Jacobite rebellion, is one step closer to community ownership following a successful bid to the Scottish Land Fund.
